snippet: In “The Last Holiday: A Memoir,” Gil Scott-Heron, who died last year, describes his life and America in the second half of the 20th century.
abstract: Dwight Garner reviews book The Last Holiday: A Memoir by Gil Scott-Heron.
lead_paragraph: In “The Last Holiday: A Memoir,” Gil Scott-Heron, who died last year, describes his life and America in the second half of the 20th century.

headline.seo: ‘The Last Holiday: A Memoir’ by Gil Scott-Heron - Review
headline.main: His Story: A Writer of Words and Music
headline.print_headline: His Story: A Writer Of Words And Music
